attributes.action:
Make night rate compulsory between the hours of 
10pm and 6am
attributes.background: I think this is needed as Asda have just started a new contract that is being forced on all employees that cuts night rate from 10pm to 6am to 12am until 5am meaning night employees lose out on 3 hours night rate

rejection.details: This is a matter for your employer, not for the UK Government or Parliament. You could take up the issue with your employer or union representative if you have one.
